project.description: Mt Wilson is a middleware solution that enables data centers to attest to the trust of hypervisors and operating systems on multiple devices including Servers, Clients, Network and Storage components. The primary purpose of this attestation is for Trust Verification, Remediation, Reporting, and Compliance in a Data Center and Cloud environments. Whether it is public cloud, private cloud, hybrid or Enterprise cloud, the Attestation Solution can be used by Cloud/Virtualization Resource Schedulers, SIEMs, Policy Engines and GRC tools, to assess and provide an Assurance that the security components on the devices are protecting the assets executing or stored on the devices.
